name: Two Missions
description:
A game that is not a game, it's actually two, in which one is not a game, it's actually a mission. So you have "two missions" for this "transmission" theme on the Global Game Jam. 

I made this project with two diversifiers: Palindrome (play my first game and finish to understand) and Inception

My first game is an experience walking simulator, but at the end you can find the real message of this game.
My second game is a multiplayer game for two, three or four players where you need to avoid bombs and stay alive in the field. You have got random power-ups on the field. Be the last one.
